50  void arc( const Vec2f &center, float radius, float startRadians, float endRadians, bool forward = true );

54 
56  void close() { mSegments.push_back( CLOSE ); }
57  bool isClosed() const { return ( mSegments.size() > 1 ) && mSegments.back() == CLOSE; }
58 
60  void reverse();
61 
62  bool empty() const { return mPoints.empty(); }
63  void clear() { mSegments.clear(); mPoints.clear(); }
64  size_t getNumSegments() const { return mSegments.size(); }

122 
123 inline std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream &out, const Path2d &p )
124 {
125  size_t pt = 0;
126  for( size_t s = 0; s < p.mSegments.size(); ++s ) {
127  if( p.mSegments[s] == Path2d::MOVETO ) {
128  out << "M " << p.mPoints[pt].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt].y << " ";
129  pt++;
130  }
131  if( p.mSegments[s] == Path2d::LINETO ) {
132  out << "L " << p.mPoints[pt].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt].y << " ";
133  pt++;
134  }
135  else if( p.mSegments[s] == Path2d::QUADTO ) {
136  out << "Q " << p.mPoints[pt].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt].y << " " << p.mPoints[pt+1].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt+1].y << " ";
137  pt += 2;
138  }
139  else if( p.mSegments[s] == Path2d::CUBICTO ) {
140  out << "C " << p.mPoints[pt].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt].y << " " << p.mPoints[pt+1].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt+1].y << " " << p.mPoints[pt+2].x << " " << p.mPoints[pt+2].y << " ";
141  pt += 3;
142  }
143  else {
144  out << "Z ";
145  }
146 
147  }
148 
149  return out;
150 }
